title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama. Works in Node.js and modern browsers via the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama. Install with pip install ollama to chat or generate completions from any Python script.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama. Exposes Ollama models as LangChain LLMs and chat models with standard callbacks and prompts.

title: ollama-webui
summary: A feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed open-webui). Supports multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG via document uploads and more.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models written in Node.js. Supports conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings Ollama-powered code completion and inline chat into the editor using the Copilot UI.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama. Provides synchronous and asynchronous APIs for chat, generate, embeddings and model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama. Simple idiomatic Ruby client with full coverage of the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that connects to a local Ollama server. Demonstrates streaming responses and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration for Ollama. Use Ollama models as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG template combining Ollama, ChromaDB and LangChain for private document question-answering.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook of recipes and examples: function calling, vision, fine-tune, LangGraph, Autogen, etc.

title: ollama-model-librarian
summary: Utility to scan and curate a local library of GGUF models and automatically register them with Ollama via Modelfile templates.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that adds Ollama-powered AI assistance for summarizing notes, brainstorming and translation inside your knowledge base.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake that packages Ollama and several models for reproducible deployment on NixOS or via nix-shell.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node-affinity and PVC model caching.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension for chatting and generating code with Ollama models from inside the editor sidebar.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Experimental Dagger module that wraps Ollama for CI/CD pipelines—spin up local LLM services inside Dagger containers.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API with Tokio and serde.
